pages.text: Removes ailments, fire and negative effects from all creatures near the ritual, for the duration of the ritual.$(br2)This includes the wild mage casting the ritual, but $(warning) also any hostile creatures that may wander nearby.$(br2)$(info) Villagers already recovering from the Zombie curse will do so quicker while this ritual is active.$(br2)$(standing_stones) $(l:rituals/ritual_purity#multiblock)This ritual requires standing stones.$()
